title: How to Make an Airsoft Gun out of a Nerf Gun

steps.title: Get a Nerf gun; any will do.
steps.content: Get a Nerf gun; any will do.

steps.title: Get a Nerf Dart (the ammo for Nerf gun) and pull the end off of it.
steps.content: Get a Nerf Dart (the ammo for Nerf gun) and pull the end off of it. You will have a foam tube.

steps.title: Get a Bic pen and use pliers to take out the back and front so you have a tube.
steps.content: Get a Bic pen and use pliers to take out the back and front so you have a tube.

steps.title: Stick the Bic pen tube into the foam tube; nearly half of the pen should be covered by the dart.
steps.content: Stick the Bic pen tube into the foam tube; nearly half of the pen should be covered by the dart.

steps.title: Place the dart end into the barrel, push down on the dart as far as you can, then push the pen tube into the barrel.
steps.content: Place the dart end into the barrel, push down on the dart as far as you can, then push the pen tube into the barrel.

steps.title: Cock and shoot nothing a few times to ensure that it doesn't fall out.
steps.content: Cock and shoot nothing a few times to ensure that it doesn't fall out.

steps.title: Cock and shoot at your hand, if air pressure is present, good job!
steps.content: Cock and shoot at your hand, if air pressure is present, good job!
